scripts.copy-config: copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.json dist && copyfiles environment*.json dist
scripts.copy-assets: mkdirp dist/public && mkdirp dist/public/assets && ncp src/public/downloads dist/public/downloads --filter="public\b(?:\\?[^\\.]+)*(\.zip)*$" && ncp src/public/assets dist/public/assets
scripts.build-webapp-dev: npm run copy-assets && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --mode=development
scripts.build-webapp: npm run copy-assets && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --mode=production
scripts.build: tsc && npm run build-webapp && npm run copy-config
scripts.prestart-dev: npm run clean && npm run prebuild && npm run build-webapp-dev && tsc && npm run copy-config
scripts.start-dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development PRINT_WHOLE_LOADER=yes DEBUGGER_DELAY=1000 concurrently "tsc --watch" "nodemon --inspect=5858 dist/server.js"
scripts.prestart-dev-full: npm run clean && npm run prebuild && tsc && npm run copy-config && npm run copy-assets
scripts.start-dev-full: cross-env NODE_ENV=development PRINT_WHOLE_LOADER=yes DEBUGGER_DELAY=1000 concurrently "tsc --watch" "webpack --watch --mode development" "nodemon --inspect=5858 dist/server.js"
